bossDialog: Big, ugly giant! You can't catch me! Nya nya nya-\n\n(You grab one of the fairies out of the air and eat it to show you're not going to be taunted. Horrified, the rest of the fairies attack!)
Heehee! Look, friends, a new plaything for us! A silly looking one, too!
Hey! Listen! I'll give you some useful advice; get out of my treasure room before I rip your skin off!

cardBonuses.4: Increases the base amount of {RES_CRYSTAL} gained from battles by 15.
cardBonuses.6: You have a 15% chance to gain double {RES_CRYSTAL} from battles.

master.dialog: Fae may be small in appearance, but get enough of them together and you'll be in for quite a nasty surprise! Sure, their personalities leave much to be desired, but there's no creatures I'd rather have on my side than a pack of Fae. Allow me to introduce you to mine!
master.name: Sylphe

name: Fae
